website_summaries.verdict: Semi-permanent hair color by a trusted brand that has earned many satisfied users for producing long-lasting color.
pros: Earns praise from repeat customers for looking natural and lasting for weeks
Covers gray reasonably well for a product in its class
Made with natural, plant-based ingredients like aloe and jojoba oil that moisturize hair
cons: Not all shades turn out as expected – may end up looking too brassy or too dark

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on resistant grays
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product but in the end, it doesn't work for my resistant grays. I tried the shower cap, the blow dryer, etc, but it leaves a faint light brown color on my hair and washes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sunanda Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Best product if you do not like to use chemicals on your head
customer_reviews.text: I used this product since I started having grey hair. I like that is washes away and can show my grey hair in a natural way instead of looking like a skunk as when using permanent dye hair products.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This was a big waste of money. I wish I hadn't bought the 3 pack now. It is easy to use, but does not cover my roots at all. I was hoping it would extend my color by 2 weeks. Not going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine7739

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for quick touch-ups
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that it doesn't cover the "tough grays" around my temple even though I bought a much darker shade than my natural color in order to get good coverage and I left the product on for the maximum time per the instructions. This product is okay for "in-between" colorings.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyG

customer_reviews.title: Do-it-yourself hair dye is not difficult !!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and more economical than going to a hair salon to have this done, so says my wife who does this !
customer_reviews.author: Prof. P J Gammarano

customer_reviews.title: Hope they never stop selling this
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this item several times. I like it because it's only semi-permanent and very gentle on my hair. I can't find it where I live so I hope they never stop selling it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SET2011

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality hair color that is very gentle. I have a lot of allergies and I can use this hair product without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Fancier

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: I did not expected to cover my grays but at least blend them a little bit, after leaving it for 30 minutes, my grays were exactly the same than without it. Natural Instincts, at least, blend them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: The color doesn’t last and this is a mess when using. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ydelsi S. Santana N

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product - easy to use, color is true.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous 2

customer_reviews.title: Best dye ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best hair dye I've ever used. So easy to use and the color came out awesome. I've used hair dye for year's, all different kinds and none compare to this.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Very temporary
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last, after first wash of hair its gone !
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lassen

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I add a bottle to my shampoo and a bottle to my conditioner, this technique works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Always good in between regular coloring.
customer_reviews.text: Always good in between regular coloring. Gentle. It does stain a bit..so applying a bit of cream around hairline first helps. Especially good if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie P.

customer_reviews.title: What happened
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if they made changes in this product when I used it about two years ago it lasted long and covered the grays. This the grays didn’t cover well and after one wash my gray was back
customer_reviews.author: laflee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: So much cheaper than I was paying at Sally's Beauty supply store....Arrive quickly, in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rios-Anderzak

customer_reviews.title: Semi Permanent Hair Dye
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use but it does not cover grey hair well.
customer_reviews.author: Arlie

customer_reviews.title: Covers well but color doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The color didn't a last long but it covered well.
customer_reviews.author: Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Colors well and does not hurt my hair. I use it about once a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE

customer_reviews.title: Did not cover grey roots at all
customer_reviews.text: I was using Clairol Natural Instinct for years (worked great) until they changed the formula (green box) recently. Someone suggested I try this Beautiful semi-permanent line. It is easier to use without needing to mix with a developer. However, my virgin grey roots did not take the color at all even when I had left the dye on my hair for 1 hour! I guess I'll have to find a demi-permanent one from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Margarite Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: IN 60 YEARS OF COLORING MY HAIR, THIS PRODUCT IS HANDS-DOWN THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: A) First things first...doesnt waste money and stress the enviroment with superfluous packaging; It's simply a bottle. B) No miximg C) Easy to appy. The bottle is the applicator D) Unlike "permanent" hair color which should not be covered with a shower cap, Clariol Beautifil can be covered which prevents accidents. E) Unlike other permanent and semi-permanent colorings, this has next to zero rub off. F) On my hair it's even more permanent than permanent colors.
customer_reviews.author: M. bell

product_meta.title: Clairol Beautiful Collection #B018D Darkest Brown 3 Ounce (88ml) (3 Pack)
product_meta.description: Enriched With Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil & Vitamin E Blends Gray And Leaves Hair Feeling Moisturized Up To 45% More Shine
feature_bullets: Enriched with Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil & Vitamin E
Blends gray and leaves hair feeling moisturized

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
